name: Jürgen Döllner
content: Computer Graphics Systems | Hasso-Plattner-Institut Prof. Dr. Jürgen Döllner Computer Graphics Systems The Department of Computer Graphics Systems and the professorship "Analysis and Planning of Software Systems with a Focus on Computer Graphics Systems", headed by Prof. Dr. Jürgen Döllner, concentrate on visual computing and AI for geometric, spatial and non-spatial data. The research focuses on the analysis and visualization of 3D geodata and 3D point clouds, image and video data, spatial digital twins and highdimensional abstract data spaces. Prof. Dr. Jürgen Döllner Function Head of Computer Graphics Systems Room G-3.1.11 Phone: +49 331 5509-170 Mail: juergen.doellner@hpi.de Office Johanna Westphal Office Assistant for Computer Graphics Systems Phone: +49 331 5509-170 Mail: office-doellner@hpi.de About the research group HomeTeachingResearchPublicationsTeam Last change: 18/02/2025, Mareike-Vic Schreiber
